about_the_game:
Fear the Phantom is a paranormal investigation game for 1-4 players. When starting a match, one player will be selected to become the ghost. The other players have to work together to gain evidence to use for exorcising of the ghost. The ghost has to interact with the environment to scare the other players, to gain power which can later be used to start a hunt. The ghost's goal is to kill all the ghost hunters.

There are several pieces of equipment which all have their purpose in getting rid of the unholy being. Figure out where the ghost died using a thermometer then find the cursed object using a radiation reader and an EMF. When you have found enough evidence, use that information to attempt the exorcising process. Doing it wrongly will have devastating consequences.

  • CO-OP cloud based multiplayer.
  • Intense PvP with a learning curve.
  • A lot of various equipment with different uses.
  • Dark atmosphere with immersive ambiance.
  • Proximity chat. The players can communicate when close to each other. The ghost can eavesdrop, but the players cannot hear the ghost talking.
